headline: Asleep  No More
abstract: With her first museum retrospective, the artist (and fashion muse) talks about confecting fanciful works with a core of steel.
lead_paragraph: If Rachel Feinstein had a spirit guide, it would probably be Sleeping Beauty. For the artist — known for her extravagantly detailed fantasy sculptures, installations and paintings — the fairy tale princess may be the most relatable of the otherworldly creatures that animate her work.
